title: ‘I Was So Close Last Year:’ Simon Yates Targeting Podium in Tour de France Rematch
content:
Jayco-AlUla star on racing as an underdog: 'It’s getting harder and harder to be competitive against the super teams.'

Read the full article at ‘I Was So Close Last Year:’ Simon Yates Targeting Podium in Tour de France Rematch on Velo.
author: ahood
